content.question: A plane flies horizontally with constant speed <math alttext="v sub p minus g, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> relative to the ground. While in flight, the plane ejects exhaust in the opposite direction at a speed <math alttext="v sub e minus p, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> relative to the plane. Which expression correctly represents the velocity of the exhaust relative to the ground?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of, open parenthesis, v sub p minus g, end sub, close parenthesis, squared, plus, open parenthesis, v sub e minus p, end sub, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mpadded><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mpadded><mo>+</mo><msup><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative v sub e minus p, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub p minus g, end sub, plus, v sub e minus p, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub p minus g, end sub, minus, v sub e minus p, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub p minus g, end sub, minus, v sub e minus p, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
